import React from 'react' import Img from './Img'; import CommentPanel from './CommentPanel' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { url } from '../url' import { Icon } from 'antd'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css' class PostListItem extends React.Component { render(){ return (

{this.props.item.username}

{this.props.item.datetime}

{this.props.item.content}

 ) } } export default PostListItem
